ECHO.ACCOUNT_CONFIRMED: Account confirmed: you can now sign-in.
ECHO.EMAIL_CHANGED: Email address successfully updated. You now have to sign-in again.
ECHO.EXTERNAL_CALENDARS_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_ER: Error while linking the external account; try again
ECHO.EXTERNAL_CALENDARS_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_SU: The external account is now linked. Go back to the calendars page to complete the configuration
ECHO.GITHUB_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_ERROR: Error during the integration of GitHub; try again.
ECHO.GITHUB_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_SUCCESS: GitHub has been connected. You can now complete the configuration.
ECHO.TRELLO_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_ERROR: Error during the integration of Trello; try again.
ECHO.TRELLO_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_SUCCESS: Copy and paste the following token in the previous page to complete the configuration: {{token}}
ECHO.YOU_CAN_CLOSE_THE_PAGE: You can close this page now.

OFFLINE.DONT_EXIT_APP_DISCLAIMER: Please, don't exit the app while synchronising
OFFLINE.DOWNLOAD_LOG: Download a log of the failed request
OFFLINE.DOWNLOAD_RESOURCES_EXPLANATION: List of the resources available offline
OFFLINE.ERROR_DURING_LAST_SYNC: There was an error during the last synchronisation; please try again.
OFFLINE.FEATURES_REDUCED_CONTENTS_NOT_UP_TO_DATE: Functionality is reduced and contents may be not up to date
OFFLINE.FULL_SYNC_DISCLAIMER: All the offline data will be removed and the operation could take several minutes
OFFLINE.HUGE_SYNC_NEED_MANUAL_CONFIRMATION: There is a lot of data to synchronise. Confirm to proceed.
OFFLINE.REQUEST_FAILED_EXPLANATION_I: Upload failed for this resource; please try again.
OFFLINE.REQUEST_FAILED_EXPLANATION_II: If the error persist, cancel the request to proceed.
OFFLINE.REQUEST_FAILED_EXPLANATION_III: You can request a log of the error for further analysis.
OFFLINE.UPLOAD_QUEUE_REQUESTS_EXPLANATION: Resources created offline that must be uploaded online
